REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0744 reute d f BC-MILLIPORE-<MILI>-ACQU 03-12 0066

TEXT.TITLE: MILLIPORE <MILI> ACQUIRES EQUITY IN PROTEIN
TEXT.BODY: <Protein Databases Inc> said Millipore Corp through its venture capital subsidiary, Millicorp, acquired an equity position in the company. Protein said it and Millipore intend to establish an "interactive relationship." No other details were disclosed about the amount of Millipore's investment in Protein. Reuter
